context.lastInteraction: Inbound demo request submitted with 10 email opens
context.history: Initial inbound lead from pricing page review, customer selecting sales assist AI preference

metrics.notes: 200 intake calls/week, 50-60 PD calls/week. 60-70% pre-call contact rate (30-40% gap). Need to quantify: cost of no-shows, time spent on manual prep

economicBuyer.notes: Unknown. Eugene is Director but unclear if he controls budget. Need to probe.

decisionCriteria.notes: Implied: ROI on automation time savings. Need to validate if there's a threshold.

decisionProcess.notes: Unknown. Eugene can downgrade self-serve, but expansion would require approval?

paperProcess.notes: Unknown. Currently monthly - annual would require procurement?

pain.notes: Validated: Pre-call engagement (30-40% cold), meeting prep (clunky handoff), attribution (unreliable)

champion.notes: Eugene is engaged, asking good questions, opened to expanding scope. He built the automation infra 3 years ago.

competition.notes: Status quo (HubSpot native) is the main competitor. No external tools mentioned.

context.amount: Current $50K ARR → At risk of $10-15K. Opportunity to defend or expand to $100K.

groundTruth.whatHappenedNext: Discovery call scheduled and conducted, major use case loss identified
actualRisksThatMaterialized: Unknown if genuine interest or price shopping

context.lastInteraction: Deep discovery call with Eugene identifying three pain points and expansion opportunity
